response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and potential impact, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,350,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, making it an attractive proposition for you. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your financial considerations and strategic goals. I look forward to discussing how we can collaborate on this opportunity.", "product_price": 1350000}
